channel.title: Combattscape Home location
channel.description:
im using the combattscape source from here
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381911.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381911.0.html[/url]
but i cant figure out how to change my login area ive searched the playerhandler.java but couldnt find it, i noticed when i log in its got an area that it logs into, not just a single coord.

ok ty but what should i search for i usually search for coords but this doesnt use the same coord every time you login, its using an area of coords thats different every time
